TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OlkContactPhotoEvents_MouseDownEventHandler(OlMouseButton Button, OlShiftState Shift, float X, float Y);
.class public auto ansi sealed OlkContactPhotoEvents_MouseDownEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OlkContactPhotoEvents_MouseDownEventHandler(Button As OlMouseButton, Shift As OlShiftState, X As Single, Y As Single)
public delegate void OlkContactPhotoEvents_MouseDownEventHandler(OlMouseButton Button, OlShiftState Shift, float X, float Y);

param.name: Button
param.span: 常量，指定已按下鼠标的哪个按钮。

span.span: An constant that specifies which button on the mouse has been pressed.

param.name: Shift
param.span: 中常量的按位或掩码枚举，指定是否已按下了 SHIFT、 CTRL 或 ALT 键。

span.span: A bitwise-OR mask of constants in the enumeration that specifies whether the SHIFT, CTRL, or ALT keys have been pressed.

param.name: X
param.span: 标识鼠标指针在 X 轴上相对于窗体的位置。

span.span: Identifies the location of the mouse cursor on the X-axis relative to the form.

param.name: Y
param.span: 标识鼠标指针在 Y 轴上相对于窗体的位置。

span.span: Identifies the location of the mouse cursor on the Y-axis relative to the form.

summary.span: 这是针对相应对象中的事件的委派。在对事件实现回调方法后，使用此委派将回调方法连接到该事件。如果存在多个版本的事件接口，此委派将为指定版本的 Outlook 中的事件连接回调方法。

span.span: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
